welcome.title: Verify Your Identity
welcome.description: We need to verify your identity to complete your application.
welcome.privacyPolicy: üîí Your data is encrypted and protected.
welcome.tip: Verifying usually takes a few seconds.

document-selection.title: Select Your Document
document-selection.description: Choose the document you'll use to verify your identity.

document-start.title: Document
document-start.description: Please take a picture of your document. Make sure its fully visible inside the picture.

operating_license.title: Operating license
operating_license.description: Please take a picture of your business‚Äôs operating license. Make sure the document is fully visible inside the picture.

business_registration.title: Business Registration
business_registration.description: Please take a picture of your business registration document. Make sure the document is fully visible inside the picture.

proof_of_business_tax_id.title: TIN ID / Certificate
proof_of_business_tax_id.description: Please take a picture of your business TIN ID or certificate. Make sure the document is fully visible inside the picture.

bank_statement.title: Bank Statement/Letter
bank_statement.description: Please take a picture of a bank statement or of a letter from the bank. Make sure the document is fully visible inside the picture.

document-photo.title: Document Upload
document-photo.description: Place the document inside the frame and take a picture. Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

omang.title: Capture Your Omang
omang.description: Position your Omang card within the frame

lighting.tooDark: Too dark - move to better lighting

errors.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera access is required to capture your document
errors.cameraPermissionInstructions: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings

passport.title: Capture Your Passport
passport.description: Position your passport within the frame

lighting.tooDark: Too dark - move to better lighting

errors.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera access is required to capture your document
errors.cameraPermissionInstructions: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings

driversLicense.title: Capture Your Driver's Licence
driversLicense.description: Position your driver's licence within the frame

lighting.tooDark: Too dark - move to better lighting

errors.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera access is required to capture your document
errors.cameraPermissionInstructions: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings

id_card.title: Upload ID
id_card.description:
Place your ID inside the frame and take a picture. 
Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

voter_id.title: Voter ID front side
voter_id.description:
Place your voter card inside the frame and take a picture. 
Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

drivers_license.title: Drivers license
drivers_license.description:
Place your drivers license inside the frame and take 
a picture. 
Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

proof_of_business_tax_id.title: Business TIN ID/certificate
proof_of_business_tax_id.description: Place the business TIN ID/certificate inside the frame and take a picture. Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

bank_statement.title: Bank Statement/Letter
bank_statement.description: Place the bank Statement/letter inside the frame and take a picture. Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

business_registration.title: Business Registration
business_registration.description: Place the business registration document inside the frame and take a picture. Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

operating_license.title: Operating license
operating_license.description: Place the operating license document inside the frame and take a picture. Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

id_card.title: ID Card back side
id_card.description:
Place the back side of your ID Card inside the frame and 
take a picture. 
Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

voter_id.title: Voter ID back side
voter_id.description:
Place the back side of your Voter ID inside the frame and 
take a picture. 
Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

drivers_license.title: Drivers license back side
drivers_license.description:
Place the back side of your Drivers license inside 
the frame and take a picture. 
Make sure it is not cut or has any glare.

check-document.title: Review Your Document
check-document.description: Make sure the image is clear and readable

document-photo-back-start.title: ID back side
document-photo-back-start.description: Please take a picture of the back side of your ID

voter_id.description: Please take a picture of the back side of your Voter ID
voter_id.title: Voter ID back side

drivers_license.title: Drivers license back side
drivers_license.description:
Please take a picture of the back side of your Drivers 
license

check-document-photo-back.title: Review picture
check-document-photo-back.description:
Make sure the information is seen clearly, with no blur 
or glare.

selfie-start.title: Selfie
selfie-start.description:
Make sure your face is clear and is fully inside the 
frame.

selfie.title: Selfie
selfie.description:
Place your face inside the frame and take a picture. 
Make sure it is clearly visible.

check-selfie.title: Review picture
check-selfie.description:
Make sure your face is clearly visible and fits inside 
the frame.

selfie.title: Take a Selfie
selfie.description: Position your face in the oval and follow the prompts

instructions.position: Position your face in the oval
instructions.multipleFaces: Only one person should be visible

errors.turnFailed: Please turn your head as instructed
errors.livenessFailed: Liveness check failed. Please try again.
errors.timeout: Check timed out. Please try again.

cameraPermission.instructions: To take a selfie, please enable camera access in your browser settings

final.title: Success
final.description: Your identity has been successfully verified.

loader.text-two: This may take a few seconds

resubmission.201-description: It seems like you haven't sent us all of the images we need in order to verify you. Please retry uploading the images.
resubmission.204-description: The image of the document you have sent us was in bad quality. Please retry uploading the images
resubmission.205-description: The document you have sent us seems to be damaged, please retry uploading using a different document.
resubmission.206-description: The document you have sent us was not supported. Please take a photo of a valid document.
resubmission.207-description: The document you have sent seems to be expired. Please take a photo of a valid document.
resubmission.606-description: It seems like the photo of your face was not clear, please try again.
resubmission.614-description: The document you have sent is not fully inside the picture.
resubmission.615-description: The back side of the document you have sent is not fully inside the picture.

decline.title: Failed to verify
decline.description: It seems like there was an issue verifying your documents.

timeout.title: Something went wrong
timeout.description: It seems like there was an issue verifiying your documents.

general.offline: You are offline, please check your connection
general.errorCameraAccess: Cannot access your device's camera. To proceed, go to the app's settings and enable camera permissions.

omang.title: Upload Your Omang
omang.description: Select a clear photo of your Omang card

passport.title: Upload Your Passport
passport.description: Select a clear photo of your passport

driversLicense.title: Upload Your Driver's Licence
driversLicense.description: Select a clear photo of your driver's licence

document-upload.dragDropZone: Drag and drop your document here, or click to browse

errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type (JPG, PNG, or PDF only)
errors.fileCorrupted: File appears corrupted. Please try a different file.

reviewSubmit.title: Review Your Information
reviewSubmit.description: Please review your captured images before submitting

loading.title: Processing...
loading.message: Processing your verification. This may take a moment.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

confirmation.title: Exit Verification?
confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to exit? Your progress will be lost.

welcome.title: Thibitisha utambulisho wako
welcome.description:
Tunahitaji maelezo kidogo ili kutusaidia kuthibitisha 
utambulisho wako.

document-selection.title: Pakia Kitambulisho
document-selection.description:
Chagua aina ya hati ambayo ungependa 
kutambulika nayo

document-options.drivers_license-description: Leseni ya udereva iliotolewa na serikali
document-options.voter_id-description: Kitambulisho cha mpiga kura kilichotolewa na serikali

document-start.title: Hati
document-start.description: Tafadhali piga picha ya hati yako. Hakikisha hati inaonekana kikamilifu ndani ya picha.

operating_license.title: Leseni ya Uendeshaji
operating_license.description: Tafadhali piga picha leseni ya uendeshaji ya biashara yako. Hakikisha hati inaonekana kikamilifu ndani ya picha.

business_registration.title: Usajili wa Biashara
business_registration.description: Tafadhali piga picha ya hati ya usajili wa biashara yako. Hakikisha hati inaonekana kikamilifu ndani ya picha.

proof_of_business_tax_id.title: Hati ya Utambulisho wa Mlipa Kodi
proof_of_business_tax_id.description: Tafadhali piga picha hati ya utambulisho wa mlipa kodi ya biashara yako. Hakikisha hati inaonekana kikamilifu ndani ya picha.

bank_statement.title: Taarifa ya/Barua kutoka Benki
bank_statement.description: Tafadhali piga picha taarifa ya benki au barua kutoka benki. Hakikisha nyaraka inaonekana kikamilifu ndani ya picha.

document-photo.title: Pakia Nyaraka
document-photo.description: Weka nyaraka yako ndani ya fremu kisha piga picha. Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

id_card.title: Pakia Kitambulisho
id_card.description:
Weka kitambulisho chako ndani ya fremu kisha piga picha. 
Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

passport.title: Pasipoti
passport.description:
Weka pasipoti yako ndani ya fremu kisha piga 
picha. 
Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

voter_id.title:
Kitambulisho cha Mpiga Kura 
upande wa mbele
voter_id.description:
Weka kitambulisho chako cha mpiga kura ndani ya fremu kisha piga picha. 
Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

drivers_license.title: Leseni ya Udereva
drivers_license.description:
Weka leseni yako ya udereva ndani ya fremu kisha piga 
picha. 
Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

proof_of_business_tax_id.title: Hati ya Utambulisho wa Mlipa Kodi ya Biashara
proof_of_business_tax_id.description: Hati ya utambulisho wa mlipa kodi ya biashara ndani ya fremu kisha piga picha. Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

bank_statement.title: Taarifa ya/Barua kutoka Benki
bank_statement.description: Weka taarifa ya benki ndani ya fremu kisha piga picha. Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

business_registration.title: Usajili wa Biashara
business_registration.description: Weka hati ya usajili wa biashara ndani ya fremu kisha piga picha. Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

operating_license.title: Leseni ya Uendeshaji
operating_license.description: Weka hati ya leseni ya uendeshaji ndani ya fremu kisha piga picha. Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

id_card.title: Kitambulisho upande wa nyuma
id_card.description:
Place the upande wa nyuma wa kitambulisho chako ndani ya fremu kisha 
piga picha. 
Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

voter_id.title: Kitambulisho cha Mpiga Kura upande wa nyuma
voter_id.description:
Weka upande wa nyuma wa kitambulisho chako cha mpiga kura ndani ya fremu kisha 
piga picha. 
Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

drivers_license.title: Leseni ya udereva upande wa nyuma
drivers_license.description:
Weka upande wa nyuma wa leseni yako ya udereva ndani 
ya fremu kisha piga picha. 
Hakikisha kuwa haijakatwa na haina mwako wowote.

check-document.title: Kagua picha
check-document.description:
Hakikisha taarifa zinaonekana vizuri, bila ukungu 
au mwako.

document-photo-back-start.title: Kitambulisho upande wa nyuma
document-photo-back-start.description: Tafadhali piga picha upande wa nyuma wa kitambulisho chako

selfie.description:

resubmission.201-description: Inaonakana hukututumia picha zote tunazohitaji ili kukuthibitisha. Tafadhali jaribu kupakia tena hizo picha.
resubmission.204-description: Picha ya hati uliotutumia ilikua katika ubora mbaya. Tafadhali jaribu kupakia tena hizo picha
resubmission.205-description: Hati uliotutumia inaonakana kuharibika. Tafadhali jaribu kupakia tena kwa kutumia hati nyingine.
resubmission.206-description: Hati uliotutumia haikubaliki. Tafadhali piga picha ya hati halali.
resubmission.207-description: Hati uliotuma inaonekana imeisha muda wake. Tafadhali piga picha ya hati halali.
resubmission.606-description: Inaonekana picha ya sura yako haikua safi, tafadhali jaribu tena.
resubmission.614-description: Hati uliotuma haiko ndani ya picha kikamilifu.
resubmission.615-description: Upande wa nyuma wa hati uliotuma hauko ndani ya picha kikamilifu.

decline.title: Uthibitisho umeshindikana
decline.description: Inaonekana kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuthibitisha hati zako.

timeout.title: Hitilafu imetokea
timeout.description: Inaonekana kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuthibitisha hati zako.
